name: Strength of the Wild
description:
You become further adept in Caster Form and Bear Form.

Caster Form
When using Regrowth on an ally the initial heal will have a 30% increased critical chance and the cast time of Regrowth will be reduced by 50% for 6 sec.

Bear Form
Maximum health while in Bear Form increased by 15% and you gain 5 Rage when attacked in Bear Form.

You also learn:

 Strength of the Wild
Maul the target for 8% of the target's maximum health in Physical damage.
